member.name: M:Sushi.Mediakiwi.API.Controllers.Authentication.Login(Sushi.Mediakiwi.API.Transport.Requests.LoginRequest)
member.summary: Logs a user in based on their Email / Password combination. This method will also set a cookie 'MKAPI' which contains the JWT token. The default Expiration time is 2 hours
member.param: The request containing the needed credentials
member.response: The user is succesfully authenticated
Some needed information is missing from the request
The user is not succesfully authenticated

member.name: M:Sushi.Mediakiwi.API.Controllers.Authentication.ResetPassword(Sushi.Mediakiwi.API.Transport.Requests.ResetPasswordRequest)
member.summary: Sends an email to a user containing information on how to reset his/her password.
member.response: The mail was succesfully sent
Some needed information is missing from the request
The user is not succesfully authenticated
The Send mail dependancy failed to operate

member.name: M:Sushi.Mediakiwi.API.Controllers.Authentication.Logout
member.summary: Will remove the cookie for an authenticated user.
member.response: The user was succesfully logged out
Some needed information is missing from the request
The user is not succesfully authenticated
